Kany√© Omari West (ha muru ya na afo 8 Juun 1977) bu onye Amerika na Kwu egwu nke rap
O wefutara egwu ime The College Dropout na afo 2004
Egwu nor na The College Dropout bu egwu nke madu shi mara ya oma
O wefutara kwa nnokolata abu ndi ozo, nke o kporo Late Registration na afo 2005, Graduation na afo 2007, ye nwefuta nnokolata abu nke ato, 808s & Heartbreak na afo 2008
O ne ji oru ya bu GOOD music i weputa abubu ndi ozo nor na ya
O bu onye kere, na onye were GOOD music
Ihe ozo madu shi ma Kanye West bu "Dropout Bear", o bu ihe eguregu nor na ihu nnokolata abu ya ato, na egwu ndi ozo na enyoyo nke egwu o were.
